plot: Horologue are creatures that are attracted to human regret and eats the time of its victims, causing them to age in reverse. Kiri Putin is a serious-minded swordsman who works with his "brother" as a Chronos Ruler, agents who attempt to thwart the activities of the Horologues by slowing down or speeding up time to fight.
ending_theme: "Jikan wa Mado no Mukōgawa" (Time is Beyond the Window) by Nagi Yanagi
